meanings.definition: A large particle accelerator used in high-energy physics research.
meanings.sent1: The supercollider helped scientists study tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: Researchers built a supercollider to explore the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent3: The supercollider decided to throw a party for all the atoms it collided.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a supercollider, smashing together ideas to create new theories.
meanings.sent5: The supercollider hummed with energy as it accelerated particles to incredible speeds.

meanings.definition: A device that accelerates charged particles to high speeds and causes them to collide.
meanings.sent1: The supercollider in the lab was used to create powerful collisions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use a supercollider to study the behavior of particles.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous supercollider decided to play a game of bumper cars with the particles.
meanings.sent4: Their arguments collided like particles in a supercollider, creating sparks of insight.
meanings.sent5: The supercollider roared to life, sending charged particles racing towards each other.
